name: Stick Man Wizards (Beta)
description:
READ BEFORE PLAYING:

Still having problems with UI scaling.

*FEEDBACK IS VERY APPRECIATED*

Instructions:

* Play Fullscreen*

WASD - Movement

Shift + Movement - Dash

1-9 - Switch spells (Only 1- 7 exist (no 4 either) )

LMB - Use spells (Hold LMB to charge up spells)

* also press j for free lvls :)

Currently the 'Spells' button in menu doesn't work. Ok have fun.
